article: My cousin Sandy is _ English girl. Her _ name is White. She is 12. The girl is _ . In her room, her books and tape player _ in the bookcase. Her pencil box is on the _ . Her ruler is on the desk, too. And a set _ keys are in her pencil box. A baseball is under the desk, _ it's not Sandy's. It's her brother _ . Sandy has a computer. It's on the table. There is a photo on the wall. Two girls are in the photo. Do you know _ the two girls are? Well, they are Sandy's good friends, Mary and Anna.
